name: Bros Burger
description: When that burger craving hits in Ohrid, Bros Burger is your go-to for a no-fuss, seriously satisfying experience. It's not about white tablecloths it's about the pure joy of a well-made burger. Imagine biting into a juicy patty, perfectly cooked, with all the right fixings, and that unmistakable aroma of a classic burger joint. It's the kind of place where you can grab a quick, delicious meal that truly hits the spot, leaving you feeling happy and fueled up for more adventures in beautiful Ohrid.

gallery.alt: A truly mouth-watering burger from Bros Burger, loaded with fresh ingredients and served with a side of crispy golden fries and a refreshing beer. It looks like the perfect satisfying meal in Ohrid!
The enticing menu board at Bros Burger in Ohrid, showcasing a delicious selection of burgers, hot dogs, chicken, and more. It's clearly the place to go for comfort food cravings!
A perfect shot of the iconic Bros Burger sign in Ohrid, highlighting their signature 'B' logo against a sleek, modern exterior. It's an inviting visual that promises delicious eats inside!

name: Cosa Nostra Pizza
description: Craving authentic flavors in Ohrid? Pizzeria Cosa Nostra offers a delightful menu of pizzas, pasta, and more, served in a relaxed and welcoming setting. Perfect for a casual lunch or a delightful dinner out

gallery.alt: A charming street view of 'Cosa Nostra Pizzeria' featuring a stone facade, a lively outdoor patio with dark wooden tables, and blooming flower boxes adding a touch of color.
The cozy and well-appointed interior of the restaurant, showcasing comfortable cream-colored chairs, dark wood tables, and a warm, inviting atmosphere for dining with friends or family.
A delicious spread from 'Cosa Nostra' featuring a fresh pizza loaded with tomatoes and olives, a hearty burger, and a tempting plate of pasta, all looking ready to be enjoyed.

name: Despina Event Venue & Lounge
description: Primarily a venue for weddings and private events, Despina also boasts a perfect lakeside location that's accessible at other times.

gallery.alt: The epitome of elegance at Despina Event Venue & Lounge! This close-up captures beautifully decorated tables with stunning floral arrangements and sparkling details, all against the serene backdrop of Lake Ohrid – ready for your special day.

Stepping inside Despina Event Venue & Lounge, you're greeted by a grand, elegantly draped space with expansive windows offering breathtaking views of Lake Ohrid. It's perfectly set for a luxurious indoor event with that outdoor feel.

Imagine your dream event come to life! This stunning shot of Despina Event Venue & Lounge shows elegant seating and floral arches set right on the shimmering shores of Lake Ohrid, promising unforgettable celebrations by the water.

name: Leonardo Pizza
description: Leonardo in Ohrid is your go-to spot for great food and a fantastic vibe. Come savor our delicious pizzas and more in a setting that's always ready to welcome you, whether for a casual bite or a festive gathering.

gallery.alt: A cozy corner inside Leonardo restaurant, featuring a rustic brick wall, comfortable teal and yellow chairs, and a TV for entertainment. The warm lighting creates a relaxed atmosphere.

Leonardo restaurant decorated for a special occasion, likely Valentine's Day, with bright red heart-shaped balloons floating above the light wooden tables and red-accented chairs. The space looks ready for a romantic celebration
A close-up shot of a perfectly baked, cheesy pizza from Leonardo, with a golden crust and a generous topping of melted cheese and herbs, looking incredibly appetizing and ready to be enjoyed

name: Meana Lagadin
description:
Step inside Meana Lagadin and instantly feel like you've found a warm, inviting home away from home. With its beautiful exposed brick, rustic wooden touches, and that lovely, cozy lighting, it just feels like the perfect place to gather.

They're passionate about bringing you delicious, traditional flavors that truly hit the spot, all served in an atmosphere that's genuinely relaxed and friendly. Whether you're sharing a meal with loved ones or just unwinding, Meana Lagadin promises a comfortable setting where you can simply enjoy good food and great company. It's a place where you can taste tradition and feel truly welcome.

gallery.alt: A chef proudly presents an incredibly long, rustic wooden platter laden with a variety of beautifully arranged dishes, including roasted meats or fish, pasta, fresh salads with sliced onions and tomatoes, and citrus garnishes. The vibrant spread is set against the warm, inviting brick interior of the restaurant, promising a feast.

The charming main dining area of the restaurant, featuring striking brick archways that lead to another section with a visible pizza oven or traditional hearth. Wooden tables are neatly set with place settings and small floral arrangements, inviting guests into a cozy yet elegant atmosphere with traditional decor.

A spacious and warmly lit dining room with impressive exposed brick walls featuring arched decorative alcoves that glow with soft light. Wooden tables and chairs are artfully arranged for various seating options, including comfortable banquettes along the wall, creating an inviting and refined ambiance perfect for a relaxed meal.

name: Pink Panter
description: A well-known fast-food spot in Ohrid, famous for its tasty burgers and quick service.

name: Pinokio
description: A charming and popular fast-food spot, perfect for a quick and delicious bite.

gallery.alt: The enticing display case at Pinokio, loaded with a tempting variety of freshly baked pastries and sweets. It's impossible to resist these delicious treats in Ohrid!
A cozy and inviting corner at Pinokio in Ohrid, perfect for enjoying a warm drink and a sweet treat. The comfortable seating and relaxed ambiance make it an ideal spot to unwind.
A close-up of a delightful cake, possibly from Pinokio's selection, showcasing its intricate details and delicious-looking layers. It's a sweet masterpiece waiting to be enjoyed!

name: Pizza Via Sacra
description:
Craving authentic, delicious pizza in the heart of Ohrid? Look no further than Pizza Via Sacra! This cozy spot is all about serving up perfectly crafted pizzas with that irresistible combination of crispy crust, fresh toppings, and melted cheese that hits just right.

Whether you're looking for a quick bite, a casual dinner with friends, or a late-night treat, Pizza Via Sacra delivers exactly what you're craving. With their warm, welcoming atmosphere and commitment to quality ingredients, it's the perfect place to satisfy your pizza desires. Come hungry and leave happy!

name: Simple Burgers
description: Simple Burgers in Ohrid lives up to its name by delivering exactly what you crave: straightforward, delicious burgers done right. It's that friendly, unpretentious spot where the focus is simply on a juicy patty, fresh toppings, and a perfectly toasted bun. You can feel the care that goes into making each burger a satisfying experience – the kind of meal that hits the spot without any fuss, leaving you happy and ready to explore more of Ohrid's charm.

gallery.alt: A close-up of a delightful pizza from Simple Restaurant, showcasing its perfectly golden crust and inviting toppings. It looks ready to be enjoyed as a classic, satisfying meal in Ohrid!
A comforting plate of pasta from Simple Restaurant, perhaps a rich bolognese, beautifully presented and ready to be savored. It promises a delicious and heartwarming dining experience in Ohrid.
A vibrant, refreshing salad from Simple Restaurant, bursting with fresh greens, colorful vegetables, and a delicious dressing. It's the perfect light and healthy option to enjoy in Ohrid.

name: Stazione
description: Nestled by the serene waters of Lake Ohrid, Stazione Ohrid isn't just a restaurant; it's a little slice of tranquility. Imagine escaping the bustling town center, finding a shaded spot under the trees, and listening to the gentle lapping of the lake just meters away. It's the kind of place where you can truly unwind, savoring delicious pizza and pasta with a view that soothes your soul. Stazione offers that perfect blend of good food, a peaceful ambiance, and that wonderfully simple pleasure of being close to the water – making it an ideal spot to relax and recharge in beautiful Ohrid

gallery.alt: A mouth-watering pizza, generously topped with savory prosciutto and sprinkled with sesame seeds, ready to be enjoyed in Ohrid. A perfect choice for a delicious meal!
A classic and comforting plate of spaghetti carbonara, beautifully presented with a fresh basil garnish. It looks absolutely delicious and ready to be savored in Ohrid.
A tranquil outdoor dining area in Ohrid, offering lovely views of Lake Ohrid through the shade of a large tree. The clean white tables and chairs invite you to relax and enjoy the lakeside ambiance.

name: Terasa Utarna
description:
Step onto Utarna Terrace and feel that wonderful Ohrid vibe instantly! This isn't just a place to sit it's where you can truly soak in the beauty around you. Imagine relaxing with your favorite drink, maybe a delicious bite, while enjoying those stunning views and the fresh air.

Whether you're starting your day with a peaceful coffee, meeting friends for a casual lunch, or unwinding as the sun sets, Utarna Terrace offers that perfect, easygoing atmosphere. It's simply a lovely spot to slow down, connect, and enjoy the best of Ohrid. We think you'll love it here!

gallery.alt: A beautiful outdoor dining terrace at Utarna Terrace, offering breathtaking panoramic views of Lake Ohrid and the surrounding mountains. Wooden tables with red and white checkered tablecloths are set, inviting guests to enjoy the stunning scenery.

A delicious traditional Balkan platter served on a wooden board, featuring freshly baked pastries, two kinds of spreads (ajvar and something similar to pindjur), crumbled cheese, and yellow cornmeal, all garnished with fresh lettuce. It looks absolutely inviting and perfect for sharing

The cozy and rustic indoor dining area at Utarna Terrace, featuring wooden tables and benches with red and white checkered tablecloths. Large windows offer glimpses of the greenery outside, and the wooden beams and traditional decor create a warm, inviting atmosphere.

name: The Harbour
description: An elegant venue by the lake, perfect for a refined meal or drinks. Offers a beautiful view.

gallery.alt: The elegant facade of The Harbour in Ohrid, standing proudly under a soft evening sky. Its classic architecture invites you into a world of refined tastes and beautiful moments by the lake.

A tantalizing dish from The Harbour's menu – beautifully presented sushi rolls, perhaps, paired perfectly with a glass of sparkling wine. It's a taste of the exquisite culinary experience awaiting you in Ohrid.

An incredible aerial view of The Harbour in Ohrid, showcasing its vibrant multi-level dining areas buzzing with happy guests. From the lively terraces to the elegant indoor spaces, it's clearly a popular spot to enjoy the evening atmosphere.

name: Tino Restaurant
description: Tucked along the shimmering edge of Lake Ohrid, Tino Restaurant  feels like a warm invitation to indulge in modern Macedonian cuisine with a side of stunning lake views. The dining room and summer terrace,buzz with a lively yet refined atmosphere, often serenaded by live music on weekends. Their menu is a mix of local classics—like Ohrid trout stuffed with thinly sliced vegetables—and international dishes with an Italian twist. The buffet breakfast is a generous spread, perfect for fueling a day of exploring Ohrid, while dinner feels special with show cooking and thoughtful wine pairings.

gallery.alt: Step into the bright and inviting restaurant at Hotel & Spa Tino in Ohrid, where every table offers a lovely view of Lake Ohrid. It's the perfect spot for a relaxed meal with a beautiful backdrop.

Indulge in a delightful spread of local delicacies and fine wine on the terrace of Hotel & Spa Tino, with the stunning blue waters of Lake Ohrid glistening in the sunshine. A true taste of Ohrid's charm!

Hotel & Spa Tino in Ohrid shines brightly at night, its welcoming lights inviting guests to a comfortable and elegant stay. The restaurant below glows, promising delicious experiences after a day exploring the city.

name: Anxiety Cafe
description: A unique cafe with a quirky and artistic vibe, perfect for those looking for a different kind of coffee experience.

name: Kadmo Bar
description: Kadmo Bar perches right on the lakefront with sweeping views of Old Town Ohrid—perfect for sunset drinks. From casual beers and wines to live music nights, it gives off that effortlessly cool lounge vibe. It's ideal for laid‑back evenings when you just want to soak in the lakefront buzz.

gallery.alt: Soaking up the sun by Lake Ohrid with a delightful lemon sorbet, complete with chocolate chips and a little treat on the side – a perfect moment of sweet bliss.
Pure relaxation by Lake Ohrid! Enjoying a creamy cappuccino and a scoop of ice cream with chocolate sauce, all while taking in the stunning lake views under a beautiful blue sky.

What a lovely spot to unwind! Sipping on a delicious drink (looks like a coffee or a sweet treat!) at Kadmo Lounge Bar, right by the water's edge, surrounded by good company and beautiful lake scenery.
The welcoming interior of Kaamo, showcasing our well-stocked bar, stylish brick accents, and a variety of comfortable seating options for a relaxed atmosphere.
Cozy indoor lounge area at Kaamo, featuring comfortable seating and warm wooden tables, with a seamless flow to our shaded outdoor patio overlooking the lake.
Lush outdoor patio at Kaamo, with a leafy canopy overhead and inviting seating looking out onto the beautiful Ohrid Lake.
Relaxing lakeside seating at Kaamo, offering stunning panoramic views of Lake Ohrid under a bright sky, with a hint of our vibrant branding.
Spacious and charming outdoor dining area at Kaamo, shaded by a natural vine canopy, featuring a mix of wooden and woven chairs and tables.

name: Octava
description: Octava Lounge Bar is where you go in Ohrid when you want to feel a bit chic, but still utterly at ease. Picture yourself settled into a stylish, comfortable spot, perhaps with a meticulously crafted cocktail in hand, and the shimmering expanse of Lake Ohrid just steps away. It's the kind of place that effortlessly blends a sophisticated atmosphere with a relaxed, inviting vibe. Whether you're unwinding after a day of exploring, enjoying a lively evening with friends, or simply savoring a quiet moment with a stunning view, Octava offers that perfect balance – a touch of luxury without ever feeling stuffy, making you feel right at home while enjoying the finer things.

gallery.alt: The inviting outdoor terrace of Octava Lounge Bar in Ohrid, bustling with guests enjoying the beautiful weather and relaxed atmosphere under a retractable awning. It's the perfect spot for a leisurely coffee or drink.

Step inside the elegant and modern interior of Octava Lounge Bar in Ohrid. Plush yellow bench seating and comfortable chairs create a sophisticated and cozy setting, perfect for intimate conversations or relaxing evenings.

The artistic and stylish walls of Octava Lounge Bar, adorned with vibrant framed artwork that adds a unique touch to the sophisticated ambiance. The warm lighting creates a welcoming and engaging atmosphere.

name: Pier 82
description: A modern bar with a great view of the lake, perfect for a relaxing drink.

gallery.alt: Soak up the sun and the incredible views from the vibrant outdoor terrace of Pier82 in Ohrid! The white lounge seating and blue accents invite you to relax and enjoy the lakeside ambiance.
The modern and inviting entrance to Pier82 in Ohrid, beautifully lit with soft, warm tones that beckon you inside for a delightful experience by the lake.
Pier82 in Ohrid truly comes alive at night! The exterior glows with inviting lights, highlighting its stylish design and welcoming atmosphere for an unforgettable evening by the water.

name: SU Rooftop
description: Perched above the city, this intimate spot dishes up burgers, stroganoff, and cocktails with breathtaking Lake Ohrid views. It's a romantic choice for breakfast or dinner, with a cozy, elegant vibe.

gallery.alt: The vibrant and enticing entrance to SU Rooftop in Ohrid, glowing with a purple light that hints at lively evenings and unforgettable experiences high above the city.

Soaking in the incredible panoramic views from SU Rooftop in Ohrid! Guests are enjoying drinks and conversation in the stylish outdoor seating area, with the city lights twinkling below and the sky stretching out beautifully.

Looking out from the elegant SU Rooftop, with the enchanting lights of Ohrid sparkling below. The outdoor seating, complete with cozy fire pit tables, creates a magical ambiance perfect for a sophisticated night out.

name: Alomos Night Club
description: Alomos Night Club offers a lively atmosphere with live music, primarily featuring Serbian artists and bands.

gallery.alt: The sophisticated and modern interior of Alomos Night Club, showcasing sleek lines of light and inviting seating areas. It's perfectly set up for an unforgettable night out in Ohrid.
Stepping into the vibrant heart of Alomos Night Club in Ohrid! The mesmerizing blue lighting and cool geometric neon accents create an electric atmosphere perfect for dancing the night away.

name: Coffee & Bar La Fabrique
description:
Step into Coffee & Bar La Fabrique and discover your new favorite cozy spot in Ohrid! Whether you're looking for that perfect morning coffee, a comforting hot chocolate on a chilly evening, or a relaxed drink with friends, this is the place.

With its warm, inviting ambiance and a fantastic selection of beverages, La Fabrique is designed for those moments when you just want to unwind and feel at home. It's truly a lovely place to relax, connect, and enjoy the good things in life, day or night. We think you'll feel right at home here!

gallery.alt: A delicious-looking hot chocolate or rich cocoa served in a clear mug, beautifully garnished with a coconut-rimmed edge and topped with a white chocolate truffle or coconut bonbon. It's perfectly placed next to a small green plant, promising a cozy treat.

A warm and inviting evening scene inside a cafe, featuring three traditional small glasses of dark tea, a crystal sugar bowl, and a stack of biscuits on a dark table. The background shows the softly lit interior of the cafe, with comfortable seating, suggesting a relaxing night.

The glowing exterior of a modern cafe at night, with large glass windows revealing the warm interior lights. Overhead string lights and wall sconces cast a welcoming glow onto the brick sidewalk, making the cafe look like an inviting spot to step in from the evening.

name: Dublin Irish Pub
description: Dublin Irish Pub in Ohrid is a little slice of Ireland by the lake, perfect for when you're craving that familiar pub feeling. It's the kind of place where you can unwind with a pint – and yes, they often have Guinness on tap! – soak in the warm, inviting atmosphere, and maybe even catch some live music on the weekends. Whether you're looking for a hearty bite, a refreshing drink, or just a friendly spot to chat and enjoy the view of Lake Ohrid, Dublin offers that relaxed, welcoming vibe that makes you feel right at home, even miles away from the Emerald Isle.

gallery.alt: The lively atmosphere outside Dublin Irish Pub in Ohrid on a buzzing evening. Locals and visitors gather, enjoying drinks and conversation under the bright green signage, a quintessential spot for good times.

A cozy and inviting scene in an Ohrid eatery, with two glasses of white wine accompanying a delicious baked dish and crispy breadsticks. The framed art on the deep green wall adds to the charming ambiance.

A satisfying meal featuring flavorful shawarmas with golden fries, accompanied by a fresh salad and a refreshing shot. It's the perfect casual meal to enjoy in Ohrid, with a comfortable green chair inviting you to relax.

name: INclusive
description:
Tired of the same old night out? Get ready for a breath of fresh air at Inclusive Disco in Ohrid! This isn't just another club; it's a place where you can genuinely let loose and enjoy yourself. They've crafted a truly modern and vibrant space with fantastic lighting and sound, making every beat feel incredible.

What really sets them apart? They're all about quality music, great drinks, and unforgettable parties. Whether you're into soulful ballads or high-energy dance tracks, their diverse music program has something for everyone. You can expect top-notch local and international artists and DJs to keep the rhythm going, ensuring every night is a good one.

More than anything, Inclusive Disco promises a night of guaranteed comfort and safety, with impeccable service in an atmosphere that's designed to impress. It's a spot where you can truly feel at home while experiencing the best of Ohrid's nightlife. Come on down and be part of the story – you're guaranteed a fantastic time!

gallery.alt: A packed crowd lights up the dance floor at Inclusive Club, with disco balls glittering overhead and people raising drinks and heart-shaped balloons. Everyone's lost in the moment — singing, dancing, and celebrating under the colorful club lights

From the DJ's point of view, a sea of people moves to the beat under green and blue lasers at Inclusive. The DJ booth glows with rhythm as the crowd stretches all the way to the bar, dancing with full energy late into the night.

Two performers hype up a lively crowd at Inclusive Disco, with the stage bathed in light and excitement. Phones are out, people are singing along, and the atmosphere is pure Saturday-night electricity

name: Irish Pub Five
description: Irish Pub Five brings a friendly, upbeat bar vibe paired with hearty pub food. Their burgers are famously massive and tasty, and the beer list caters to both locals and craft-beer fans.With TVs for sports nights and occasional live music, it's a comfortable spot for a casual dinner or a fun night out.

gallery.alt: Stepping into the vibrant energy of the Irish Pub Five! The bar glows with a cool green light, hinting at lively evenings and good times ahead in Ohrid.

name: Jazz Inn
description: Ohrid's legendary Jazz Inn is much more than a bar—it's an intimate musical experience since 1989. Tucked in Old Town, it feels like a cozy living room where locals and tourists sip whisky while soaking in smooth jazz sets. Charming, relaxed, and beautifully authentic; perfect for anyone craving a cultural, after-dinner ambience with soul.

gallery.alt: A cozy evening unwind at Jazz Inn, with a perfectly poured drink catching the warm glow of the bar. Looks like the start of a great night!
Settling in for a relaxed evening at Jazz Inn in Ohrid. This cozy bar just radiates a welcoming, laid-back vibe, perfect for unwinding after a day of exploring.
Stepping into the timeless atmosphere of Jazz Inn, captured in classic black and white. It feels like a moment frozen in time, inviting quiet reflection.

name: Le Petit Bistro Lihnidos
description: Step into a little piece of charm at Le Petit Bistro Lihnidos! Tucked away in beautiful Ohrid, this spot is all about bringing you a cozy, warm, and inviting experience. Imagine savoring delicious bites and refreshing sips in an atmosphere that feels just like home, but with that lovely lakeside touch. It's the perfect place to unwind, share a laugh with friends, or simply watch the world go by. Come and discover your new favorite corner in Ohrid!

name: Lion
description: Lion is more than just a restaurant in Ohrid it's a delightful discovery for your taste buds, wrapped up in a genuinely warm atmosphere. Imagine stepping into a place where the love for good food is palpable, whether it's their "Slow cooked Baby Back Ribs" that have folks raving, or the fresh local fish. What truly sets Lion apart is that human touch – the owners, a couple with a passion for hospitality, have poured their hearts into creating a diverse menu that blends traditional Macedonian flavors with a fresh, international twist. It's the kind of spot where you can kick off your day with a lovely breakfast, enjoy a relaxed lunch by the lake, or settle in for a vibrant evening with great food and perhaps some live music. You can feel the dedication in every dish and the genuine desire to make your visit a memorable part of your Ohrid experience.

gallery.alt: Step into the rustic charm of Lion Pub in Ohrid! The cozy stone walls, wooden beams, and warm lighting create an inviting atmosphere, perfect for a relaxed evening with friends.
The heart of Lion Pub, where a vibrant crowd gathers around the bar, enjoying drinks and lively conversation. The warm, amber glow from the lights sets a fantastic mood for a fun night out in Ohrid.
A cozy nook at Lion Pub in Ohrid, featuring comfortable wooden tables and chairs. It's an ideal spot for a more intimate chat or enjoying a delicious meal in a relaxed, traditional setting.

name: Liquid Cafe Bar
description: Right by the lake, Liquid Cafe Bar is the perfect haven for both coffee lovers and cocktail seekers. It's modern and laid‑back, serving everything from robust espresso to lakefront mojitos. . Day or night, it's a great stop for  conversation, or an Instagram-worthy sunset moment.

gallery.alt: Pure bliss by Lake Ohrid! Enjoying a refreshing coffee (or two!) with a glass of water, soaking in the gorgeous sunny sky and the calm lake. This is what vacation dreams are made of.
Stepping inside 'Liquid Ohrid,' a bright and inviting cafe right on the lake. The open design brings the stunning views indoors, making it a wonderful place to enjoy a drink and the fresh air.
Relaxing by the beautiful Lake Ohrid at 'Liquid Ohrid,' with a lovely outdoor seating area perfect for enjoying the water views and the gentle breeze. It's an ideal spot to unwind!

name: Omnia Night Club

gallery.alt: Stepping into the electrifying atmosphere of 'Omnia Nightclub' in Ohrid! The cutting-edge red lit bar with its cool geometric pattern sets the stage for an unforgettable night of music and energy.

description: As one of Ohrid's top nightlife venues, Omnia exudes high energy with a state‑of‑the‑art sound system, polished lights, and headline DJs. Located in the town center, it's where party-goers dance late into the night—especially during themed nights and DJ shows . If you're in the mood for an electric club atmosphere, this is your go-to venue.

name: Pivnica Sokak
description: Pub & Pivnica Sokak in Ohrid is much more than just a pub. It's a popular gathering spot where friends connect. Known for its inviting, brand-new ambiance and fresh offerings, it's a hidden gem that promises to become your new favorite local spot. Expect a friendly atmosphere perfect for enjoying a great selection of drinks,including a variety of Macedonian draft beers.

name: Rebel
description: Rebel is Ohrid's house & techno hotspot. With a strong calendar of themed nights and guest DJs, it's ideal for late-night dance seekers. Expect pulsing rhythm, vibrant crowd, and a seriously cool club energy. A must for electronic music fans.

gallery.alt: The dance floor is absolutely packed and buzzing with energy at a lively night out in Ohrid! Disco balls gleam, lights flash, and everyone is having an amazing time.
A fantastic black and white shot capturing a live band rocking the stage at Rebel, with the crowd grooving along. The energy is palpable, and those disco balls are working their magic!

The club is lit up with vibrant blues and oranges, creating an exhilarating atmosphere for a memorable night out in Ohrid. Lasers cut through the haze, and the crowd is completely immersed in the music.
A sophisticated bar at a lively spot in Ohrid, beautifully lit with warm, inviting tones. The shelves are fully stocked, ready to craft the perfect drink for a night of fun and good company.

name: Shilla Coffee & Bar
description: A place with a view.A beloved local spot since 2013, whose vibe spontaneously established itself as an alternative art scene hosting various cultural, social, and nightlife events while supporting young artists.Clean, crisp and fresh tasting, we seek to deliver Ohrid’s finest cocktails for 12 years.The name comes from the timeless Macedonian pop hit “Шила“ by the legendary Maja Odzaklievska, telling a story of a femme fatale fond to younger guys and blackjack. Sung in 1987, this song still sounds fresh and zestful – the kind of energy we tried to reflect here 26 years later.Whether you're in for a morning espresso or an evening cocktails, “Shilla” is where Ohrid comes alive.

gallery.alt: The wonderfully quirky and artistic interior of Shilla, featuring a captivating ceiling adorned with book pages and graphic illustrations like a motorcycle. White brick walls display an array of colorful modern art, while plants and cozy seating areas invite guests to relax and enjoy the unique atmosphere

A delicious and inviting breakfast plate on a wooden table, featuring a perfectly cooked omelette, slices of fresh tomatoes and cucumbers, a dollop of yogurt or sour cream, and two pieces of toast. A cup of espresso and a glass of orange juice complete this fresh morning spread.

The bright and welcoming exterior of Shilla Concept Bar, with its prominent white sign against a blue sky with wispy clouds. Four cheerful yellow umbrellas provide shade over an outdoor seating area, making it look like a perfect spot to enjoy a sunny day

name: Tino Pub
description: Tino Pub & Bar, right on the edge of Lake Ohrid, is that wonderful kind of place where you can truly kick back and soak it all in. It's not about being fancy it's about the feeling of the sun on your face, the gentle lapping of the water, and the easygoing hum of conversations. Grab a refreshing drink, maybe a cool beer, and let the relaxed lakeside ambiance wash over you. Whether you're catching up with friends or simply enjoying a quiet moment with that incredible view, Tino's offers a perfectly chill escape in the heart of Ohrid.

gallery.alt: The inviting and cozy interior of Tino Pub in Ohrid, with its warm wooden accents and comfortable seating, looks like a perfect spot to relax and enjoy a drink.
Welcoming signs for Paulaner beer outside Tino Pub & Bar in Ohrid, suggesting a friendly atmosphere and a great place to enjoy a refreshing German brew.
A peek inside Tino Pub in Ohrid, offering a glimpse of its comfortable seating and the relaxed ambiance. You can even see a hint of the outside world, promising a lively yet cozy experience.

name: Adventure Ohrid
description: For thrill-seekers! Adventure organizes custom, action-packed tours, from paragliding over the lake to off-road safaris in Galichica National Park. Many activities offer incredible, unique lake views.

gallery.alt: Three vibrant water sports gear items rest on a pebbled shore near Lake Ohrid: a sleek gray-and-yellow paddleboard, a bold yellow surfboard with swirling designs, and two bright orange kayaks. In the background, a shady tree, parked cars, and a cozy house with a floral tablecloth hint at a lively summer day by the water, inviting adventure seekers to explore.

Two friends enjoy a sunny kayaking adventure on the crystal-clear waters of Lake Ohrid, paddling an orange kayak with lush green cliffs and forested shores in the background. The serene blue sky and gentle ripples reflect the natural beauty of this Macedonian gem, perfect for a day of outdoor fun.

Two hikers stand proudly on a rocky trail overlooking the stunning landscapes of Ohrid, with rolling green hills stretching toward the shimmering lake in the distance. Dressed in colorful activewear and holding trekking poles, they soak in the panoramic view under a bright blue sky, showcasing the region's hiking allure.

name: Amfora Diving Center
description: Ever wondered what ancient secrets lie beneath Ohrid's shimmering surface? Amfora Diving Center isn't just about scuba gear it's your personal invitation to unlock a hidden world. Imagine the quiet thrill of descending into crystal-clear waters, discovering submerged archaeological parks that tell tales of lakeside life millennia ago, or exploring vibrant freshwater ecosystems. Here, the friendly, passionate instructors don't just teach you to dive; they share their love for Ohrid's unique underwater heritage, making every breath below the surface feel like a discovery and a true connection to this ancient lake. It's an unforgettable journey into the silent, beautiful history beneath your feet.

gallery.alt: The team at Amfora Diving Center, looking ready for an exciting day of underwater exploration! Divers are geared up and preparing to discover the hidden wonders of Lake Ohrid.

Dive into adventure with Amfora Diving Center! Divers explore the fascinating underwater world of Lake Ohrid, with the clear blue water revealing intriguing rock formations and perhaps ancient secrets.
A diver with Amfora Diving Center surfaces from the crystal-clear waters of Lake Ohrid, surrounded by the stunning natural beauty of the area. It looks like a refreshing and unforgettable experience!

name: ATV Adrenaline
description: Ready to truly experience Ohrid's untamed beauty? ATV Adrenaline Ohrid takes you beyond the postcard views into the heart of Galicica National Park. Feel the surge of excitement as expert guides lead you through rugged terrain, revealing spectacular vistas of both Lake Ohrid and Lake Prespa. It's more than just an exhilarating ride; it's a personal journey into untouched nature, promising unforgettable thrills and memories forged with every turn.

gallery.alt: Gear up for an adventure! A powerful ATV, ready for action, is parked on a rugged, winding dirt path, promising an exciting off-road journey through the stunning landscapes of Ohrid.
Experience the thrill of the ride! Riders on ATVs navigate a dusty trail, kicking up dirt as they explore the scenic, untamed terrain around Ohrid. It's an exhilarating way to connect with nature.
Two adventurous ATVs parked side-by-side, perfectly positioned for a thrilling ride through the picturesque, unpaved roads of Ohrid's beautiful countryside. Get ready to explore!

name: ATV Adventure Ohrid
description: ATV Adventure Ohrid isn't just about hopping on a quad bike; it's about unlocking a thrilling new perspective of this stunning region, guided by folks who genuinely love to share its beauty. Imagine feeling the wind on your face as you zoom through off-road trails, climbing to breathtaking viewpoints where both Lake Ohrid and Lake Prespa stretch out beneath you. It's the kind of experience where friendly, expert guides not only ensure your safety but also sprinkle in local insights and share their passion for the landscape. You're not just a rider you're an explorer, weaving through charming villages and untouched nature, creating unforgettable memories with every turn of the wheel. It's an adrenaline rush with a personal touch, making you feel connected to the wild heart of Ohrid.

gallery.alt: Get ready for an exhilarating ride! A powerful ATV parked on a dusty trail, perfectly poised for an off-road adventure through the stunning natural landscapes surrounding Ohrid.
Embrace the thrill! Riders on ATVs navigate a winding dirt road, kicking up dust as they explore the rugged terrain. It looks like an exciting way to experience the wild beauty near Ohrid.

Two adventurous riders on ATVs making their way along a scenic, unpaved road. The natural beauty of the area unfolds around them, hinting at an unforgettable journey through Ohrid's diverse landscapes.

name: Exodus
description: Exodus Gym in Ohrid is a modern fitness facility designed for champions. Featuring a professional boxing ring, a well-equipped strength training area, and a variety of functional fitness options, it's the perfect place to push your limits and achieve your fitness goals.

gallery.alt: Step into the focused energy of Exodus Gym in Ohrid, featuring a professional boxing ring with the inspiring message 'TRAIN LIKE A CHAMPION' boldly displayed. It's a space built for dedication and pushing your limits.

The well-equipped strength training area at Exodus Gym in Ohrid, showcasing a variety of machines, free weights, and a full-length mirror. The modern design and ample equipment create an environment ready for serious workouts.

A glimpse into the diverse training options at Exodus Gym in Ohrid, with a focus on functional fitness. Weight plates, suspension rings, and battle ropes highlight the variety of ways to challenge yourself and reach your fitness goals.

name: FitBox
description: A specialized fitness studio focusing on high-intensity interval training and boxing workouts.

gallery.alt: Elegant gym mirror wall with motivational quote 'Attitude is Everything', surrounded by lush green indoor plants and sleek gym equipment in the background.
Spacious, high-end gym interior featuring advanced strength machines, stylish lighting, and rubber flooring—designed for safe and effective full-body workouts.
Luxury fitness area with free weights, benches, and cable machines under designer lighting—ideal gym for bodybuilding, personal training, and muscle building.

name: FitForm
description: A friendly and welcoming gym with a focus on functional fitness and personal training.

gallery.alt: Sunlit cardio gym room with treadmills, exercise bikes, and elliptical machines—ideal fitness center for morning workouts and heart health training.
Strength training gym area with weight benches, barbells, and resistance machines—perfect for bodybuilding, powerlifting, and muscle gain.
Fully equipped weightlifting gym with squat racks, benches, and free weights—top gym for serious lifters and personal fitness goals.

name: IB Fitness
description: A modern fitness center in Ohrid with high-quality equipment for strength and cardio. It's a great place to work out with professional machines and amenities, but it's an indoor facility.

gallery.alt: A lively group of fitness enthusiasts moves in sync during a workout session in a spacious Ohrid gym, stepping and stretching on a polished red court under bright lights. With colorful activewear and a basketball hoop overhead, the scene radiates energy and community, inviting visitors to join the fun.

Friends and players enjoy a friendly table tennis match in a bright Ohrid indoor court, with blue tables set against green netting and a basketball hoop in the background. The casual vibe, with some holding paddles and others watching, promises a great time for sports lovers of all ages.

A modern gym in Ohrid features sleek Star Trac treadmills lined up by large windows, offering views of a pool and green trees outside. The inviting setup with cutting-edge equipment under natural light beckons fitness enthusiasts to start their workout with a scenic backdrop.

name: Kliment Koleski
description: The Kliment Koleski Sporting Complex in Ohrid is a modern, large-scale facility that serves as a hub for athletic excellence and community events. It features an indoor track and other amenities for various sports.

gallery.alt: The impressive facade of the Kliment Koleski Sporting Complex in Ohrid, bathed in the warm glow of evening lights. Its modern design and grand scale suggest a hub for athletic excellence and community events.

A dynamic action shot of athletes competing on the indoor track at the Kliment Koleski Sporting Complex. The vibrant blue track and focused expressions highlight the energy and dedication found within this premier sporting facility in Ohrid.

name: Ljubanishta Beach & Camping
description: Ljubanishta Beach & Camping is a vibrant destination on the shores of Lake Ohrid, offering more than just a place to pitch a tent. With a beautiful beach, a welcoming restaurant, sports facilities, and an adventure park with a ropes course, it's the perfect spot for family fun, relaxation, and outdoor adventure.

gallery.alt: A warm, inviting restaurant pavilion in Ohrid features wooden ceilings and large windows framing a stunning view of Lake Ohrid. Elegant tables with white chairs and floral centerpieces are set for a special occasion, blending indoor comfort with the serene outdoor beauty of the lake and distant trees.

A lively beach along Lake Ohrid glows at sunset, with colorful umbrellas dotting the sandy shore and people swimming and boating in the calm waters. The backdrop of rolling hills under a pink and orange sky captures the vibrant energy of a summer day by the lake, perfect for visitors seeking fun.

A peaceful autumn scene at Lake Ohrid showcases a pebbled shore meeting crystal-clear water, reflecting the golden-orange hues of trees and hills. The tranquil landscape under a soft morning sky invites quiet reflection and nature lovers to explore this picturesque Macedonian spot.

A blue sports court nestled near Lake Ohrid features a basketball hoop and soccer goal, surrounded by lush green hills under a bright blue sky. The serene setting with a lens flare from the sun suggests a perfect spot for outdoor games and family fun in this scenic region.

An adventurous soul navigates a rope course in Ohrid, balancing on wooden platforms between sturdy wooden poles with rope ladders, set against a backdrop of vibrant green and golden hills. Wearing a helmet and harness, they embody the thrill of outdoor exploration in this natural playground.

name: SUP Club Ohrid
description: Glide across Lake Ohrid on a stand-up paddleboard! They offer guided tours, perfect for all levels, allowing you to peacefully explore hidden coves and enjoy unparalleled lake views from the water.

gallery.alt: Embrace the tranquility of Lake Ohrid with Sup Up Club! A group of paddlers are gracefully gliding across the calm, blue waters on stand-up paddleboards, enjoying the serene beauty of the lake.

The perfect morning on Lake Ohrid with Sup Up Club! Paddleboarders are enjoying the peaceful sunrise or sunset on the water, with the sun casting a warm glow and the mountains silhouetted in the distance.
Get ready for a unique adventure on Lake Ohrid with Sup Up Club! A paddleboard is launched from a sunny, rocky shore into the inviting blue water, ready for a serene exploration of the lake's beauty.

name: Ambulance
description: Ambulance Ohrid represents the critical frontline of emergency medical services (EMS) for the city and surrounding region. As the primary provider of pre-hospital care, their teams respond to a wide range of medical emergencies and accidents, often providing initial stabilization and life-saving interventions on-site. They function as the essential link to further medical treatment, transporting patients to the General Hospital of Ohrid or other specialized facilities for comprehensive Emergency Room (ER) care.

name: Cardiology center St. Stephen
description: The Institute for Prevention, Treatment, and Rehabilitation of Cardiovascular Diseases – Ohrid, often referred to as "Cardio Ohrid," is a highly specialized public health institution dedicated to comprehensive cardiac care. It focuses on the prevention, diagnosis, treatment, and rehabilitation of cardiovascular diseases, playing a crucial role in managing heart health for the region. As a specialized center, it aims to provide advanced and focused care for patients with heart-related issues.

name: Dentoria Dental
description: Dentoria Dental in Ohrid is a modern dental clinic offering a wide array of high-quality dental services. They specialize in areas like general dentistry, oral surgery, prosthetics (including various types of crowns), and dental implantology, often utilizing the latest technology. Dentoria is committed to providing excellent customer service and patient satisfaction at competitive prices, serving both local residents and international dental tourists.

name: Dr. Batkoski - Dental Center
description: Dr. Batkoski – Dental Center in Ohrid is a modern dental clinic renowned for providing high-quality, comprehensive dental services to both local patients and a significant number of international dental tourists. With over 25 years of experience, they offer a wide range of treatments, from general dentistry and cosmetic procedures like veneers and teeth whitening to specialized services such as dental implants, orthodontics (including Invisalign), and oral surgery. The clinic is known for its expert team, modern equipment (including 3D scanning), affordable prices, and commitment to patient satisfaction, often exceeding EU regulations and offering free consultations.

name: Dr. Elena Dental Clinic
description: Dr. Elena Dental Clinic in Ohrid is a welcoming private practice dedicated to providing essential and reliable general dental care. Focused on the oral health of the local community, the clinic offers a range of services from routine check-ups and cleanings to restorative treatments. Situated on Bul. Turistichka 40, Dr. Elena Dental Clinic aims to deliver accessible, high-quality care in a comfortable setting, helping patients maintain healthy smiles.

name: Dr. Mojsoska Dental & Aesthetic center
description: D-R Mojsoska Dental Centar in Ohrid is a specialized center for dental and aesthetic medicine, evolved from a general dentistry practice established in 2004. They offer a comprehensive range of services, excelling in Orthodontics and Implantology for advanced dental solutions, alongside facial aesthetic treatments like hyaluronic fillers and botulinum toxin. The clinic is committed to providing high-quality care with an expert team, addressing both routine and complex cases to help patients achieve their ideal smile.

location.address: D-r Mojsoska Dental & Aesthetic center, Ohrid

name: General Hospital of Ohrid
description: The General Hospital of Ohrid is a key public health institution serving the Ohrid region, providing a wide array of general medical and specialized care. It offers comprehensive inpatient and outpatient services, emergency care, and diagnostic capabilities, catering to both local residents and the numerous tourists visiting the city. The hospital is continuously engaged in efforts to modernize its facilities and equipment to enhance patient outcomes, and includes departments such as infectious diseases. It forms an integral part of the regional healthcare network, often collaborating with other specialized medical centers in Ohrid, such as the Orthopedics and Traumatology Hospital "St. Erazmo" and the Institute for Cardiovascular Diseases.

name: Lasovski Dental Office
description: Lasovski Dental Office in Ohrid is a well-established dental center founded in April 1993, with over 30 years of experience. Led by Dr. Bebi Lasovski and more recently joined by Dr. Hristijan Lasovski, they provide a comprehensive range of professional dental services. Their offerings include restorative, reconstructive, and cosmetic dentistry, along with specialized treatments such as dental implants, root canal treatment, pediatric dentistry, and aesthetic procedures like hyaluronic acid fillers. They are known for their commitment to excellence, patient comfort, and continuously integrating new knowledge and techniques.

name: Malaricna
description: "Маларична Охрид" is a historically significant Health Center in Ohrid, North Macedonia, named for its pivotal role in the region's fight against malaria a century ago. Today, it continues to serve as a primary healthcare hub, offering general medical services and diagnostics to the community. The site is currently at the center of a public debate regarding proposals to replace the recently renovated building with a new multi-story residential complex, raising concerns among citizens and heritage advocates about urban planning and the preservation of public spaces in this UNESCO World Heritage city.

name: Merifarm
description: A reliable pharmacy providing prescription medications, over-the-counter drugs, and health products. Merifarm is committed to serving the community's healthcare needs with professional advice and a wide range of medical supplies.

name: Pasholi Pharmacy
description: Pasholi Pharmacy offers a wide range of pharmaceutical products, medical supplies, and health consultations. Committed to providing excellent customer service, their team of professional pharmacists is ready to assist with your healthcare needs.

name: Pharmacy Planta
description: Pharmacy Planta provides a wide selection of medications, health supplements, and personal care items. With a focus on patient well-being, their professional staff offers expert advice and friendly service.

name: PZO Dr. Jolevski
description: PZO "D-r Jolevski" in Ohrid is a dental clinic known for providing a wide range of services, including general dentistry and specialized treatments like orthodontics. Led by dentists such as Dr. Mirko Jolevski, Dr. Ljubo Jolevski, and Dr. Mersiha Eminovic Ljato, the clinic offers various procedures including braces, X-rays, laser dentistry, dentures, and consultations. They operate throughout the week, with private patients welcome, focusing on comprehensive dental care in Ohrid.

name: St Erasmus
description: The Special Hospital for Orthopaedic Surgery and Traumatology "St. Erazmo" in Ohrid is a leading public medical institution dedicated to the comprehensive care of the locomotory system. It provides advanced services for orthopedic diseases, acute trauma, and reconstructive surgery, alongside neurosurgery, urology, and rehabilitation. Located on the shores of Lake Ohrid, it serves as a vital specialized healthcare center for the region, continually modernizing its facilities and techniques for advanced patient outcomes.

name: Tilevi Dental
description: Tilevi Dental in Ohrid is a local dental office committed to providing general dental care for the community. Located at Car Samoil 8, they offer essential services like check-ups, cleanings, and common restorative treatments in a patient-focused setting. With regular operating hours from Monday to Saturday, Tilevi Dental aims to provide accessible and reliable dental services to ensure the oral health of its patients.

name: Via Farm
description: Via Farm is a well-stocked pharmacy providing a range of prescription and over-the-counter medications, health products, and professional advice from qualified pharmacists to meet your healthcare needs.

name: Via Farm - 13
description: Via Farm is a well-stocked pharmacy providing a range of prescription and over-the-counter medications, health products, and professional advice from qualified pharmacists to meet your healthcare needs.

name: Via Farm - 2
description: Via Farm is a well-stocked pharmacy providing a range of prescription and over-the-counter medications, health products, and professional advice from qualified pharmacists to meet your healthcare needs.

name: Zegin No. 2
description: Zegin Pharmacy is a trusted local pharmacy offering a comprehensive selection of prescription medications, over-the-counter remedies, vitamins, and personal care products. Their knowledgeable pharmacists are available to provide professional advice and support for all your health and wellness needs.

name: Zegin No. 3
description: Zegin Pharmacy is a trusted local pharmacy offering a comprehensive selection of prescription medications, over-the-counter remedies, vitamins, and personal care products. Their knowledgeable pharmacists are available to provide professional advice and support for all your health and wellness needs.

description: Zegin Pharmacy is a trusted local pharmacy offering a comprehensive selection of prescription medications, over-the-counter remedies, vitamins, and personal care products. Their knowledgeable pharmacists are available to provide professional advice and support for all your health and wellness needs.

description: Zegin Pharmacy is a trusted local pharmacy offering a comprehensive selection of prescription medications, over-the-counter remedies, vitamins, and personal care products.
